text: Amory "Amo" Houghton, Jr. (August 7, 1926 - March 4, 2020) was an American politician and businessman from the U.S. state of New York. He was a member of the United States House of Representatives serving from 1987 through 2005. He was a member of one of upstate New York's most well known families in business, the Houghton family. He was a member of the Republican Party. Houghton was born in Corning, New York. He studied at Harvard University. He was married to Priscilla Dewey until her death in 2012.
